patterns: the vending machine stole my cash
responses: Is this a payment issue? Did you use credit or cash?
This might be a credit card issue. Did you tap or swipe your card?

patterns: I tapped my card and it didn't work
responses: Credit card Tap seems to be the issue. You can try swiping your card, or go HERE for more information.

patterns: Swiped my card and it didn't work
responses: Credit card seems to be out of service. You can try cash, or go HERE for more information.

patterns: The machine charged me twice 10 dollars instead of just 5
responses: Not to worry! This seems to be a PreAuth issue. Head HERE and we'll take of that for you.
